title: Olympic National Park: Hurricane Ridge Webcams
body: Hurricane Ridge Webcam        View of Bailey Range from south side of Hurricane Ridge Visitor Center. NPS Photo by Bryan Bell                       Hurricane Ridge Special Notice, July 29, 2016 -- the view from this webcam has been temporarily adjusted so that smoke from the Godkin and Hayes fires can be monitored. This view looks almost due south from Hurricane Ridge, with the long, deep valley of the Elwha River visible on the right side of the screen. For fire information, check our news release page at http://go.nps.gov/ONPnews   View webcam                              Hurricane Ridge Parking Lot This view from the north side of Hurricane Ridge Visitor Center is often monitored by locals to check the weather or snowpack to determine if conditions are good for a trip up the mountain.
